155 inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& stream, const VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType& state) {
156  switch (state) {
157  case VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType::MAKE:
158  stream << "MAKE";
159  break;
160  case VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType::MODEL:
161  stream << "MODEL";
162  break;
163  case VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType::YEAR:
164  stream << "YEAR";
165  break;
166  case VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType::TRIM:
167  stream << "TRIM";
168  break;
169  case VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType::GEOGRAPHY:
170  stream << "GEOGRAPHY";
171  break;
172  case VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType::VERSION:
173  stream << "VERSION";
174  break;
175  case VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType::OPERATING_SYSTEM:
176  stream << "OPERATING_SYSTEM";
177  break;
178  case VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType::HARDWARE_ARCH:
179  stream << "HARDWARE_ARCH";
180  break;
181  case VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType::LANGUAGE:
182  stream << "LANGUAGE";
183  break;
184  case VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType::MICROPHONE:
185  stream << "MICROPHONE";
186  break;
187  case VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType::COUNTRY_LIST:
188  stream << "COUNTRY_LIST";
189  break;
190  case VehicleConfiguration::VehiclePropertyType::VEHICLE_IDENTIFIER:
191  stream << "VEHICLE_IDENTIFIER";
192  break;
193  }
194  return stream;
195 }
